Function reference

Base Designs

Generate Random LHD

base_designs.permutations_matrix Generate (n_rows x n_columns) matrix, in which each column is a random permutation of {1,2,…,n_rows}
base_designs.random_lhd Generate a random Latin Hypercube Design
base_designs.GLPdesign Good Lattice Point (GLP) Design

Orthogonal LHD

Various constructions of orthogonal latin hypercube designs

OLHD.OLHD_Butler01 Orthogonal Latin Hypercube Design (OLHD). Based on the construction method of Butler (2001)
OLHD.OLHD_Sun10 Orthogonal Latin Hypercube Design (OLHD). Based on the construction method of Sun et al. (2010)
OLHD.OLHD_Cioppa07 Orthogonal Latin Hyercube Design. Based on the construction method of Cioppa and Lucas (2007)
OLHD.OLHD_Ye98 Orthogonal Latin Hyercube Design. Based on the construction method of Ye (1998)
OLHD.OLHD_Lin09 Orthogonal Latin Hypercube Design. Based on the construction method of Lin et al. (2009)

Criteria

Space-filling Criterias for LHD

criteria.MaxAbsCor Calculate the Maximum Absolute Correlation
criteria.MaxProCriterion Calculate the Maximum Projection Criterion
criteria.phi_p Calculate the phi_p Criterion
criteria.inter_site Calculate the Inter-site Distance
criteria.AvgAbsCor Calculate the Average Absolute Correlation
criteria.discrepancy Discrepancy of a given sample
criteria.coverage Compute the coverage measure for a design
criteria.maximin Compute the maximin criterion for a given design. A higher value corresponds to a more regular scattering of design points.
criteria.mesh_ratio Compute the meshratio criterion for a given design

Helpers

miscellaneous utilities for working with LHDs

helpers.permute_columns Random permute columns in a numpy ndarray
helpers.exchange Exchange two random elements in a matrix
helpers.williams_transform Williams Transformation
helpers.OA2LHD Transform an Orthogonal Array (OA) into an LHD
helpers.eval_design Evaluate a design based on a chosen criteria, a simple wrapper for all criteria in pyLHD
helpers.adjust_range Adjust the range of a design to [min,max]
helpers.scale Scales design to be within [0,1]
helpers.distance_matrix Distance matrix based on specified distance measure
